resources.string: Cannot connect to internet. Please check you connection settings and try again.

This Helloworld program is just a wrapper around requests to the Google Translate web service. 
The program is designed to test the ability to work with this service from an Android application in this way and make sure that it is allowed to publish such apps on Google play. 

See https://github.com/alisovets/AndroidHelloTranslate for the source code. 

Developed by Alexander Lisovets, Ukraine, 2014. 
a.lisovets.android.dev@gmail.com
